workflow.name: Publish Google Docs to WordPress with advance RankMath SEO & Gemini analysis
Google Drive to WordPress: Auto-Publish Post with Advanced RankMath SEO & Gemini Analysis

nodes.name: HTTP Request (WP - Find Post by Slug)

assignments.name: drive_published_folder_id
assignments.value: Enter the ID of the Google Drive folder where you want to move published files.

parameters.content:
## 1. Input & Cleaning
Monitors Google Drive for new files, sanitizes raw HTML, and prepares metadata for processing.

## 2. Duplicate Check
Queries WordPress to check if the post exists. Routes to "Create" or "Update" path to prevent duplicates.

## 3. AI SEO Analysis
Gemini analyzes content to generate Focus Keyword, SEO Title, and Meta Description in structured JSON.

## 4. Publish & Cleanup
Updates WordPress content, maps custom RankMath meta keys via API, and moves files to the "Published" folder.

# Google Drive to WordPress Publisher
**Auto-publish content with Advanced RankMath SEO & Gemini Analysis.**

This workflow automates the "Document Ops" process for professional content teams. It creates a seamless bridge between writing in Google Docs and publishing on WordPress, ensuring high-quality SEO standards without manual effort.

### How it works
1.  **Ingestion:** The workflow monitors a specific Google Drive folder for new HTML or Doc files.
2.  **Sanitization:** It cleans the raw HTML from Google Docs, removing messy styles and tags to ensure clean code.
3.  **Smart Logic:** It checks if the post already exists (via slug) to decide whether to Create a new draft or Update an existing one.
4.  **AI SEO Agent:** Gemini AI analyzes the content to extract the Focus Keyword, SEO Title, and Meta Description, optimizing for RankMath.
5.  **Publishing:** The content is pushed to WordPress via REST API, mapping custom RankMath meta keys that standard nodes often miss.
6.  **Archiving:** Processed files are moved to a "Published" folder.

### Setup steps
1.  **Configure Credentials:** Set up your Google Drive, Gemini (PaLM), and WordPress credentials.
2.  **Global Config:** In the `CONFIG` node, enter your WordPress URL and the ID of your "Published" folder in Drive.
3.  **RankMath API Helper:** You **MUST** install the custom PHP snippet provided in the template description to allow n8n to update RankMath metadata (Critical Step).
4.  **Trigger:** Select your "Drafts" folder in the Google Drive Trigger node.

### ‚ö†Ô∏è CRITICAL REQUIREMENT
This node requires the **RankMath Helper PHP Snippet** to be installed on your WordPress site.
Without it, RankMath fields cannot be updated via API. Check the template description!

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
